cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each marathon-lb instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each marathon-lb task.

hostname.description: Run Prometheus only on hosts matching this.

storage-path.description: Path on host to store prometheus state.

master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. The format is a comma-delimited list of hosts like zk://host1:port,host2:port/mesos. If using ZooKeeper, pay particular attention to the leading zk:// and trailing /mesos! If not using ZooKeeper, standard URLs like http://localhost are also acceptable.

pagerduty-key.description: PagerDuty Service Key to send Prometheus Alerts to
